title: Interpretation of sections 347 to 353.
content: 354. For the purposes of the foregoing provisions of this Part- the expression “certified” means certified in the prescribed manner to be a true copy or a correct translation; the expression “director” in relation to a company includes any person in accordance with whose directions or instructions the directors of the company are accustomed to act; the expression “place of business” includes a share transfer or share registration office; the expression “prospectus” has the same meaning as when used in relation to a company incorporated under this Law; the expression “secretary” includes any person occupying the position of secretary by whatever name called. 2 of 124 (I) of 2006. Transfer of registered office of companies to and outside the Republic Application of sections 354B to 354O. 2 of 124(I) of 2006.
